package.name: W3Top
package.subject: devizer
package.desc: W3Top is a web-based linux-bound monitor and benchmark UI. Here is on official storage for one-line installer for W3Top. It is not supposed to direct download archives from here. For installation please use recommended one-liner: https://github.com/devizer/w3top-bin/blob/master/README.md

attributes.name: Attention
values: It is not supposed to direct download archives from here. For installation please use recommended one-liner: https://github.com/devizer/w3top-bin/blob/master/README.md
